name: Corn Farm
description:
Use your trusty water sprayer to spray those pesky crows away from your ripe corn. Don't forget to keep the plants hydrated too!

Controls:

WASD - Move your character

MOUSE - Aim your sprayer

LMB - Spray

E - Refill your water by the barrels

F4 - Toggle Fullscreen On/Off

F5 - Restart the game

Esc - Quit the game

Additional Credits:

Acoustic Breeze by Benjamin Tissot

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/acoustic-breeze
